title: Fennica in Finna
text: can use functions provided visualize data  search specific fields like author information, publication details, call numbers using search_finna, can use Finna’s field-specific search filters. Finna allows search different fields specifying type parameter adding filters. ’s can modify search_finna function query fields:
code: library(finna) fennica <- search_finna("*",filters = c('collection:"FEN"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[1809 TO 1918]"')) refined_data <- refine_metadata(fennica) visualize_author_distribution(refined_data) fennica <- search_finna("*",filters = c('collection:"FEN"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[1809 TO 1918]"')) refined_data <- refine_metadata(fennica) visualize_word_cloud(refined_data, "Title")

title: Refine, integrate and analyse Finna metadata
text: purpose refine_metadata() function : Ensure completeness filling missing values placeholder text. Standardize key metadata fields easier analysis. Select relevant fields, simplifying dataset. refinement process makes metadata consistent user-friendly, reducing potential issues subsequent analysis reporting.
code: library(finna) sibelius_data <- search_finna("sibelius") refined_data <- refine_metadata(sibelius_data) print(refined_data) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Sibelius favourites : … Sibel… 2001  Unknown… Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … Unkno… ##  2 Sibelius                Tappe… 1967  Unknown… Taidet… Unknown… Jyväsk… Unkno… ##  3 Sibelius                Favén… Unkn… Unknown… Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… Unkno… ##  4 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… Unkno… ##  5 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… Unkno… ##  6 Sibelius                Downe… 1945  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… OUTI-k… Unkno… ##  7 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Vaasan… Unkno… ##  8 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Helmet… Unkno… ##  9 Sibelius                Tawas… 1968  swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… Unkno… ## 10 SIBELIUS                RINGB… 1948  swe      Kirja,… SIBELIU… Helle-… Unkno… ## # ℹ 90 more rows

title: Refine, integrate and analyse Finna metadata
text: integrate two datasets using full_join() dplyr, can write code directly like :
code: library(dplyr)  # Example Finna metadata (metadata1) finna_data <- search_finna("sibelius",limit = 4)  # Example other dataset to merge with (metadata2) other_data <- tibble::tibble(   Title = c("Sibelius Symphony No. 5", "Finlandia", "Valse Triste"),   Rating = c(5, 4, 3) )  # Integrate the two datasets using full_join by the "Title" column integrated_data <- full_join(finna_data, other_data, by = "Title")  # Print the integrated dataset print(integrated_data) ## # A tibble: 7 × 10 ##   id          Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series Rating ##   <chr>       <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>   <dbl> ## 1 lapinkirja… Sibe… Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA         NA ## 2 jtm.158774… Sibe… Tappe… 1967  NA       Taidet… NA       Jyväsk… NA         NA ## 3 lahdenmuse… Sibe… Favén… NA    NA       Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… NA         NA ## 4 eepos.1970… Sibe… Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… NA         NA ## 5 NA          Sibe… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA          5 ## 6 NA          Finl… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA          4 ## 7 NA          Vals… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA          3

title: Introduction to finna

what: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: function retrieves records Finna index option limit total number records returned. function paginates results, fetching records specified total limit reached.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
code: search_finna(   query = NULL,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: query description type string specifying type search. Options include "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject". Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields returned search results. Defaults NULL, returns standard set fields. filters vector filter queries refine search. Defaults NULL. facets vector specifying facets return results. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector regular expressions filter facets. Defaults NULL. sort string defining sort order results. Options include: "relevance,id asc" (default) "main_date_str desc" (Year, newest first) "main_date_str asc" (Year, oldest first) "last_indexed desc" (Last modified) "first_indexed desc" (Last added) "callnumber,id asc" (Classmark) "author,id asc" (Author) "title,id asc" (Title) limit integer specifying total number records return across multiple pages. lng string language returned translated strings. Options "fi", "en-gb", "sv", "se". Defaults "fi". prettyPrint logical value indicating whether pretty-print JSON response. Useful debugging. Defaults FALSE.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: tibble containing search results relevant fields extracted provenance information.
